model.heading: Incident Report Form
model.subheading: Please complete this form to report any type of incident. If possible, the report should be completed within 24 hours of the event. The report will be sent to HSE team directly.

model.description: More than one type can be selected. For instance a Vehicle Incident may result in an injury to the driver/passenger

StaticList.options:
Vehicle
Environmental
Fire
Injury
Theft
Illness
Sabotage
Security
External Assessment
Explosives Involved?
Radiation Involved?
Other

model.description: Please provide as much details about the incident location as you can

title.text: Please share names and contact information of incident participants and witnesses

model.error: This field must contain a valid e-mail address.
